JWT.description:
RedHat connect JWT authorization.

For some endpoints, this is an optional form of authorization that
gives access to non-public data of the company/user that the JWT
belongs to.

info.description: Pyxis is an API for interacting with Red Hat and partner container data.
info.title: Pyxis
info.x-external-description: Pyxis is an API for interacting with Red Hat and partner container data.
info.x-internal-description:
Pyxis is an API for interacting with Red Hat and partner container data.
Pyxis uses client SSL certificates to authorize its users. To find out how to get access, please visit Pyxis access request page.

_id.description: The id of advisory.

content_type.description: The content type of advisory.  i.e. for CONTAINER or RPM.

creation_date.description: Date the record was created. Value always generated on inset.

cves.description: Array of CVEs fixed by this advisory.

id.description: Unique identifier of the issue in the issue tracking system.

url.description: Publicly accessible URL of the issue information.

issues.description: Array of issues fixed by this advisory.

id.description: Unique identifier of the issue in the issue tracking system.

issue_tracker.description: Hostname of the issue tracking system used.

url.description: Publicly accessible URL of the issue information.

last_update_date.description: Date the record was last updated. Value always generated on update.

ship_date.description: The date the image advisory shipped.

synopsis.description: Short summary of the advisory. TODO set realistic limit.

type.description: The type of advisory. i.e. for RHSA:2016-1001 the type is 'RHSA'.

href.description: Content manifest of this image. RPM content included in the image.
URI to CVEs for this image with related advisory. This is the vulnerabilities that apply to this image, not those that are fixed by the image.

architecture.description: This is the field for multi-arch to distinguish between default 64bit and other arch's. Can be empty if 64bit.

brew.description: Object for all brew related fields.

build.description: Unique immutable build identifier in the brew build system.

completion_date.description: Timestamp from Brew when the image has been succesfully built.

package.description: A package name in our brew build system.

cpe_ids.description: A map of applicable advisories to RPM NEVRA, required for scoring.

cpe_ids_rh_base_images.description: A map of applicable advisories for the base_images from the red hat repositories.

creation_date.description: Date the record was created.  Value always generated on inset.

docker_image_id.description: Docker Image ID. For docker 1.10 this is also known as the 'config digest'.

freshness_grades.description: the grade based on applicable updates and time provided by PST CVE engine.

creation_date.description: The timestamp for when this grade was added by the vulnerability engine.

end_date.description: The timestamp for when the grade no longer applies. See start_date for when the grade starts.  If no value is set, the grade applies forever.  This should happen only for a grade of A (no vulnerabilities) or grade F.

start_date.description: The timestamp for when the grade applies.  See end_date for when the grade stops.

parsed_data.description: Data parsed from image metadata.  These fields are not computed from any other source.

created.description: The 'created' date reported by image metadata. Stored as string because we do not have control on that format.

docker_version.description: Version of docker reported by 'docker inspect' for this image.

layers.description: Array of layer digests from the image.

repos.description: Repositories defined within an image as reported by yum command.

size.description: Size of this image as reported by image metadata.

size_bytes.description: The uncompressed layer size in bytes.

uncompressed_size_bytes.description: Uncompressed images size in bytes (sum of uncompressed layers size).

virtual_size.description: Virtual size of this image as reported by image metadata.

advisory_rpm_mapping.description: Mapping of a NVRA to multiple advisories IDs.

nvra.description: NVRA of the RPM related to advisories.

reason.description: Reason why 'with_nvr' is or is not null.

rpms.description: List of rpms grouped by category (new, remove, upgrade, downgrade).

downgrade.description: List of NVRA which were downgraded in this image.

new.description: List of NVRA which were added to this image.

remove.description: List of NVRA which were removed in this image.

upgrade.description: List of NVRA which were upgraded in this image.

with_nvr.description: NVR of image which this image was compared with.

image_advisory_id.description: The _id of the redHatContainerAdvisory that contains the image advisory.

push_date.description: When the image was pushed to this repository. For RH images this is picked from first found of advisory ship_date, brew completion_date, and finally repositories publish_date. For ISV images this TBD but is probably going to be only sourced from publish_date but could come from parsed_data.created.

registry.description: Hostname of the registry where the repository can be accessed.

tags.description: List of image tags that are signed with the given key.
List of container tags assigned to this layer.

manifest_schema1_digest.description: Available when manifest_schema2_digest is not. All legacy images.

removed_date.description: Date this tag was removed from the image in this repo. If the tag is added back, add a new entry in 'tags' array.

sum_layer_size_bytes.description: The total size of the sum of all layers for each image in bytes. This is computed externally and may not match what is reported by the image metadata (see parsed_data.size).

replaced_by_repository_name.description: If deprecated what is the new repo name we should point to instead?

repository.description: Combination of image repository and namespace.

requires_terms.description: Flag indicating whether (false) the repository is published on the legacy registry (registry.access.redhat.com), or (true) can only be published to registry.redhat.io.

runs_on.description: Describes what the image can be run on.

openshift_online.description: Can the image run on openshift_online.

source_container_image_enabled.description: Flag indicating whether images associated with this repo are included in workflows where non-binary container images are published alongside their binary counterparts.

support_levels.description: The support levels of a repository.

tech_preview.description: Flag indicating whether the repository is in tech preview or not.

total_size_bytes.description: Total size of all images in bytes.

total_uncompressed_size_bytes.description: Total size of all uncompressed images in bytes.

ui_get_this_image_override.description: When populated this field will override the content on the 'get this image' tab in red hat container catalog.

vendor_label.description: Label of the vendor that owns this repository.

get.summary: Get the repositories for a vendor label
